name: part_001
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE【チラ見せ】 [wCblx1C_j68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Bandai commercial featuring hololive City '24 goods, figures, and an interactive photo booth.
Good Smile Company commercial for scale figures of Hoshimachi Suisei and AZKi, featuring the song 'The Last Frontier'.
FuRyu Prize commercial showcasing various hololive plushies and figures available in amusement centers.
Undone commercial for collaboration watches featuring 90 hololive and HOLOSTARS talents.
iPASS commercial for hololive 6th fes. blind packs and payment services in Taiwan.
JOYSOUND X1 commercial featuring a man rapping about song selection and AI scoring, followed by two women singing.
A long, scrolling montage of fan-written messages and artworks celebrating 'hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony'.
Title card for CREATORS' STAGE listing various music creators and illustrators.
Attention notice for visitors regarding lighting effects and cheering rules during the performance.
List of penlight colors for various hololive members followed by more fan messages.

subtitles.original: 新商品をご紹介！
subtitles.english: Introducing new products!

subtitles.original: ホロライブエキスポ2025限定の
subtitles.english: The special Ichiban Kuji photo booth exclusive

subtitles.original: 一番くじ特設フォトブースも展開中。
subtitles.english: to hololive EXPO 2025 is also open.

subtitles.original: モニターをタッチしてくじ券をめくり、
subtitles.english: Touch the monitor to flip the lottery ticket,

subtitles.original: 出てきたデザインと一緒に撮影できます。
subtitles.english: and take a photo with the design that appears.

subtitles.original: グッスマ
subtitles.english: Good Smile

subtitles.original: The last frontier から しなやかに
subtitles.english: Gracefully from the last frontier

subtitles.original: 捧げる歌を
subtitles.english: A song to dedicate

subtitles.original: 胸いっぱいの
subtitles.english: Full of emotion

subtitles.original: 旅立つ歌を
subtitles.english: A song for the journey

subtitles.original: フリューから「ホロライブ」プライズが
subtitles.english: Hololive prizes from FuRyu are appearing

subtitles.original: 全国アミューズメント施設にて続々展開中！
subtitles.english: one after another in amusement centers nationwide!

subtitles.original: 台湾旅行中、最も便利な決済サービスを提供します。
subtitles.english: Providing the most convenient payment service during your trip to Taiwan.

subtitles.original: 新商品まもなく登場！
subtitles.english: New products coming soon!

subtitles.original: だったらジョイサウンドX1で歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: Then let's sing with JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 Only One
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1, the only one

subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1, number one song count

subtitles.original: AIが採点 絶賛 カラオケ最高
subtitles.english: AI scoring is amazing, karaoke is the best

subtitles.original: 本物最高
subtitles.english: The real deal is the best

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND EVOLUTION 見よ 曲数No.1
subtitles.english: Witness JOYSOUND EVOLUTION, number one song count

subtitles.original: 歌いたい曲があるって最高
subtitles.english: It's great to have the songs you want to sing
